data.text: @Tania_EDA yeah I also couldn't find a testing site that would fill this. Many of them said they have their own format. I wonder if it will be okay....

@Claytonlukito many places wont fill it in., even the clinic i have appointment today in said they will email me their certificate with all the information on the mofa but on their own form , i also dont get why many places still dont fill it up
@Claytonlukito Yes !!! My aunt just went back last month and she had to fill that. But the testing authority will have to fill and the doctor will have to sign and stamp on it.
@Claytonlukito It’s best to use Japan‘s form because they will give you 100% trouble at the airport
@Claytonlukito I'd think using the JP base would always be the safe bet, but that any form should be valid as long as it has all the same information.
